summary: Dramatic looking dawnguard armors and crossbow.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This mod changes the color of all dawnguard armors and crossbow to make it look dramatic. I only changed diffuse.
[/size]This fits to my taste because I'm nothing more than a shadow in the dark.

[size=3]2k body armor.[/size]
[size=3]2k shield.[/size]
[size=3]2k crossbow.[/size]
[size=3]1k boots&gloves.[/size]

[color=#6aa84f][size=5]How to Install?[/size][/color]
[size=3]Automatically with manager or you know what to do.[/size]

[color=#6aa84f][size=5]Q&A[/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5]Q: [/size][size=3]Where can I get those damn claws and wings?
[/size][size=5]A: [/size][size=3]I used Evil Wings from [/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53271/?]Animated Dragon Wings[/url] and the claws are called [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46958/?]Wolverine Claws[/url].[/size][/font]
author: ProtologolusX
